file.title: Split without quotes

p.text: Allows any text divided into parts, separated by a character or string. And then returns the part of the text number you specify. If during the search in the text to meet a piece of text, isolated quotes, then this piece is passed and the search it is not performed.

p.textAll: For example, if you break the text Hey, how ',' case, and? apart, indicating separation character ",". That text would break into 'hello' , 'how', 'case' and 'and?' . And if you specify a number of Part 2, you get the text 'how', 'case' . Often you need to know how many parts of crashed text. It is available commando number of parts without the quotes .
